inclusion.criterion: in the last trimester of pregnancy (at least 28 weeks + 0 days but not more than 36 weeks + 0 days of gestation)
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: patient is a 22yo F, no mention of pregnancy

inclusion.criterion: access to and ability to use iPhone (for downloading and using Ajuvia app)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient has an iPhone mentioned in the discharge instructions

inclusion.criterion: residing in the Greater Adelaide Area
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: musculoskeletal disorder that prevents sleeping supine or on a certain side (e.g., arthritic shoulder)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 22yo F with systemic mastocytosis, presenting with flushing and tachycardia. She responded well to IV steroids and was discharged on her home meds.
